task_text: [Vaccinology][Comparative-Analysis] Compare cold-chain and storage-temperature requirements across vaccine types described in the WHO market analysis and MDPI paper.

gold_end_state.summary: WHO and MDPI note variability in cold-chain needs: some mRNA vaccines may require ultra-cold storage compared with many viral-vector or protein-based vaccines that have standard cold-chain requirements; these differences affect logistics, distribution equity, and deployment feasibility in resource-limited settings.

quiz.question: Which vaccine platform is commonly associated with more stringent cold-chain needs?
options: Inactivated vaccines requiring room temperature storage
